name: Draw 'n' Go 2
description:
OMG! Free for limited time!
High in the clouds there lived kind and funny creatures. They lived where the Rainbow begins. But once… Something dark smashed their Rainbow house. Some creatures fell and dropped down to the ground.

To return home they have to go the long way, full of danger in the unknown lands. Only you can help them!

Meet the Draw'n'Go 2 Adventure Puzzle, where you help the heroes – Use Rainbow-Balls to reach the Rainbow-World by drawing them safely away!

FEATURES:
•Original gameplay with finger drawing.
•Shiny graphics
•More than 40 unique levels
•Four colourful worlds with different mechanics
•Game Center support
